name: Spell Duel
description:
A chaotic and magical take on Pong that pits two sorcerers against each other in a Spell Duel. Cast a variety of spells onto the battlefield, such as fireballs, poison, ice, and...seals?! Defend your side by reflecting oncoming magic back at your opponent.

The rules of the game are simple:
  • Drop your opponent's health to zero to win the game.
  • When a spell reaches your magical barrier then your damage multiplier increases, making it so that you take more damage!
  • To prevent spells from reaching your barrier or hitting you,  simply reflect the spells back.
Key Features include:
  • Up to two players can play.
  • Customize which spells can be used, and the amount of health each player will have.
  • Variety of spells, each with their own characteristics and properties.
  • Keyboard and Controller support
